posts.title: Ambrosia - A Corner of the Quiet Internet
posts.description: Ambrosia is a project designed to help empower people to craft their own intentional community space.
posts.lead: Ambrosia is a project designed to help empower people to craft their own intentional community space.

posts.title: Truly Own Your Code with Self Hosting
posts.description: Creating an alternative to the noisy, copilot-filled experience of Microsoft's GitHub for your projects.
posts.lead: GitHub has been living on inertia for years, as the default choice. But the community good will might well run out.

posts.title: Dump Everything in one TCP Window and Never Worry Again
posts.description: Let the network do all the heavy lifting and you never have to think about performance ever again
posts.lead: Put everything in the first TCP packet (14KB) and the network handles the rest. No performance anxiety. No compromise.
